promptPrefix:
[TARGETLANGUAGE] Generate a [PROMPT] between the following particints (Pedro, Adrian, Alexis, Sergio) where they point out areas for improvments regarding their investigation problem.

Example:
Adrian: Hey, Pedro I belive you coul re write the title in order to make it seem more interesting, sincte its currently boring.
Pedro: I see! you are totally correct, ill get on that
Pedro: By the way Alexis, I think you have a lot of spelling mistakes in your paper.
Alexis: ....

The Investigation problem for each participant is the following:
[PROMPT]: ¿Como la falla de Communicacion, la mala definición de alcance y la mala gestión de riesgo dentro de los proyectos, afectan de manera económica a la empresa?
[PROMPT]: Falta de programación de mantenimiento en las cámaras de maduración de Jumex
[PROMPT]: No se alcanza el objetivo de ventas en una pasteleria
[PROMPT]: Did not do the assignment.
title: Group Discussion
